articles.description: BRUSSELS -     Europe's antitrust chief, Margrethe Vestager, has warned Apple Inc to give equal treatment to all apps on its platform amid the iPhone maker's privacy changes that have drawn charges of anti-competitive practices from rival Facebook Inc.

articles.title: Scientists warn over misuse of climate models in financial markets - TODAYonline
articles.description: LONDON -     Misuse of climate models could pose a growing risk to financial markets by giving investors a false sense of certainty over how the physical impacts of climate change will play out, according to the authors of a paper published on Monday.

articles.title: Hardest hit by pandemic, bottom 10% of households see earnings shrink 6.1% in 2020 - TODAYonline
articles.description: SINGAPORE — Households in the bottom 10 per cent saw their average monthly income per member shrink by S$37 last year, or 6.1 per cent of their total earnings from work, making them the group hit hardest by the Covid-19 pandemic.
